@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

account.

attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
Buy token with Wei.

     * The Wei will be deposited until crowdsale is finalized.
If crowdsale is success, raised Wei will be transfered to the token.
If crowdsale is fail, buyer can refund the Wei.

     * Note The minimum investment is 1 ETH.
Note the big finger issue is expected to be handled by frontends.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
attributes.name: buyToken

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to less than minimum investment."

attributes.type: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to less than minimum investment."
attributes.value: Failed to buy token due to less than minimum investment.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to exceed cap."

attributes.type: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to exceed cap."
attributes.value: Failed to buy token due to exceed cap.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to crowdsale is closed."

attributes.type: literal_string "Failed to buy token due to crowdsale is closed."
attributes.value: Failed to buy token due to crowdsale is closed.

attributes.documentation:
Check whether crowdsale goal was reached or not.

     * Goal reached condition:
1. total raised wei >= goal (soft cap); and
2. Right amout of token is prepared for this contract.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token
@return Whether crowdsale goal was reached or not
attributes.name: _goalReached
_refundSurplusTokens

attributes.documentation:
Pay commission by raised Wei amount of crowdsale.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
attributes.name: _payCommission
_refundCrowdsaleTokens

attributes.documentation:
Enable refunds of crowdsale.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
attributes.name: _enableRefunds

attributes.documentation:
Finalize a crowdsale.

     * Once a crowdsale is finalized, its state could be
either Closed (success) or Refunding (fail).

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
attributes.name: finalize

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to finalize due to crowdsale is opening."

attributes.type: literal_string "Failed to finalize due to crowdsale is opening."
attributes.value: Failed to finalize due to crowdsale is opening.

attributes.documentation:
Pause crowdsale, which will set the crowdsale state to Refunding.

     * Note only pause crowdsales which are suspicious/scams.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
attributes.name: pauseCrowdsale

attributes.documentation:
Claim crowdsale raised Wei.

     * @param _token Deployed ERC20 token address
